title: About Us
description: Elite Commercial Door, Inc. is a state licensed & insured premier company for all of your automatic or manual commercial door needs.
location-card-description: Based in South Florida, we can service any of the Tri-County areas (Palm Beach, Broward or Miami-Dade) in short notice.
business-card-description: We are a family owned business with over 18 years in the commercial door industry
service-card-description: We can service and install Automatic Door assemblies, Manual steel door assemblies, Storefront assemblies and all respective hardware.
